about_the_game:
In ANGST, you awaken alone in a vast, frozen wilderness, where survival is your only goal. The icy winds howl, wolves prowl the dark forests, and every resource must be fought for. Chop down trees to build fires that stave off the biting cold, craft weapons from scavenged materials, and struggle to stay alive.

The world of ANGST is unforgiving, but beneath the snow and ice lie secrets waiting to be uncovered. How long can you survive in this hostile land before the darkness closes in?

By day, you hunt and gather, chopping wood to build fires and crafting weapons to protect yourself. By night, the wilderness comes alive with deadly creatures and strange entities that react to your actions. Some will guide you, while others seek to end your journey as quickly as it began. Don’t trust everything you see—some things want to help, while others lurk in the shadows, waiting to strike. How you navigate the world is up to you, but survival is never guaranteed.

As you navigate the wilderness, uncover the mysteries hidden within the hollow. Who are you, and why are you here? Complete quests that slowly reveal the world’s hidden past and your place within it. Encounter mysterious entities that react to your choices, subtly pushing you toward your fate. The story unfolds through exploration and survival—each quest brings you closer to uncovering the truth, but every step deeper into the wild also brings greater peril.

Every choice in ANGST shapes your survival. Brave the wilderness by day, gathering food, wood, and supplies to endure the night. Craft tools, weapons, and shelter to push deeper into the Hollow’s dangerous biomes, where each death teaches you a lesson and unlocks new skills. Adapt to the ever-changing environment, upgrade your character, and choose how you evolve to face the escalating threats. Build a survival strategy that suits your play style, but remember—what works one day may not save you the next.

Step into an expansive world where no two survival experiences are the same. Explore dense forests, frozen rivers, and desolate plains, each biome presenting unique challenges. Scavenge through abandoned cabins, cut down trees for firewood, and fish in icy waters. But beware—every sound in the distance could mean danger, and the deeper you venture, the deadlier it becomes. The open world of ANGST is as beautiful as it is brutal, and only the most prepared will survive its many dangers.

Survive the wilderness of ANGST alone or with friends. In online co-op mode, team up with others to explore The Hollow together. Share resources, fight side by side against predators, and work shoulder to shoulder to craft tools and build shelter. Brave the hostile environment, uncover its secrets, and see how long you can survive in this frozen limbo.

  • OS: MacOS 12 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Dual-Core 1.4 GHz or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 or similar
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Optimized for 16:9 aspect ratios
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS Monterey 12.6.7 or later
  • Processor: Intel i7 Six-Core 2.6 GHz or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 5300M or similar
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Optimized for 16:9 aspect ratios

short_description: ANGST is a solo & co-op wilderness survival game set in a freezing, gritty, stylized Low-Poly limbo-like world. Craft tools and weapons, hunt, fish, and fight to stay alive. Upgrade skills to venture deeper into the wild, but be warned: what lurks there can thwart your plans. Survive the ANGST!
supported_languages: English, German, Russian, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish
